title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks fall amid China's COVID restrictions, packed earnings week - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks fall amid China's COVID restrictions, packed earnings week  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks turned higher Monday afternoon, shaking off earlier losses as concerns over an escalating COVID outbreak in China added to jitters over U.S. economic growth in the face of heightened inflation and monetary policy tightening.
